doc.str: SPARE BATTERY INTERFACE DEVICE OF A PORTABLE ELECTRONIC PRODUCT

A spare battery interface device of a portable electronic product comprises a body of the portable electronic product, an internal power deposed within the body, wherein the body is provided with a active standard battery base, the active standard battery base can accommodate at least one standard battery, the electrode slices corresponding to a positive/negative electrode of the battery are deposed within the active standard battery base, the electrode slices are connected to the internal power via a battery charging circuit.
Bonsoninfo Ltd., 4/F, Building B., N0. 89-91, Zhongshandadao, Guangzhou, Guangdong 510630, CN
